title: Problem 2155_C
statement: There are n wizards in a row numbered 1 to n from left to right. Each wizard has an invisibility cape which can be worn either on his left side or on his right side. Harry walks from the position of wizard 1 until the position of wizard n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5), and registers how many wizards he sees from each wizard's position.
